Death Wish

Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt1137450

Classificação: 6.3

Sinopse: Dr. Paul Kersey (Bruce Willis) is a surgeon who only sees the aftermath of his city's violence as it's rushed into his ER--until his wife (Elisabeth Shue) and college-age daughter (Camila Morrone) are viciously attacked in their suburban home. The police are overloaded with crimes so Paul, burning for revenge, hunts for his family's assailants to deliver justice. As the anonymous slayings of criminals grabs the media's attention, the city wonders if this deadly avenger is a guardian angel--or a grim reaper. Fury and fate collide in the intense action-thriller Death Wish.—MGM
